titles.title: How Deep Is The Grace Of Our God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How deep is the grace of our God?
How deep is the grace of our God?
To the bottom of the sea, He reached down for me.
That's how deep is the grace of our God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
How high is the grace of our God? (2x)
Every star up above partakes of His love.
That's how high is the grace of our God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
How wide is the grace of our God? (2x)
From the east to the west, it shall never fail the test.
That's how wide is the grace of our God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
How long is the grace of our God? (2x)
From the mountains to the plain, Jesus Christ is the same.
That's how long is the grace of our God.
